member.name: M:TaskLibrary.Task.#ctor(System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Constructor to initialize a new Task with a name and assigner.
member.param: The name of the task, which must be at least 5 characters long.
The name of the assigner, which must be at least 5 characters long.
member.exception: Thrown when the task name or assigner name is invalid.

member.name: P:TaskLibrary.Task.NumeTask
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the task.
member.exception: Thrown when the task name is invalid.

member.name: P:TaskLibrary.Task.DataAsignarii
member.summary: Gets the assignment date of the task in "dd-MM-yyyy" format.

member.name: P:TaskLibrary.Task.OreLogate
member.summary: Gets or sets the logged hours for the task.
member.exception: Thrown when the value for logged hours is less than or equal to 0.

member.name: P:TaskLibrary.Task.DescriereTask
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the task.

member.name: P:TaskLibrary.Task.NumeAssigner
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the assigner.
member.exception: Thrown when the assigner name is invalid.
